title: Manager 7.1 (International)
description:
Our Manager 7.1 solution is designed for candidates applying to entry-level leadership positions who tend to supervise salaried employees. Sample tasks for these jobs include, but are not limited to: planning projects with subordinates; collaborating with senior managers on developing new methods and procedures; coaching employees on performance-related issues; developing employees ' skills; coordinating activities with other managers to accomplish organizational goals; setting and meeting department goals; prioritizing multiple tasks and priorities; making selected strategic and day-to-day decisions; and solving employees' and customers' problems.
Report Language Availability: English (USA), Danish, Finnish, Canadian French, Italian, Norwegian, French, German, English International,.
â€œIMPORTANT! Please note that you will need to select the correct package depending on which norm you intend to use. The package available for this product is International".
jobLevels: Director, Executive, Front Line Manager, Manager,
languages: English (USA), English International, French, German, Portuguese (Brazil), Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Dutch, French (Canada),
